verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sweet Sacrament Divine,
hid in thine earthly home;
Lo round thy lowly shrine,
with supplicant
hearts we come.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, to thee our voice
we raise, in songs of love
and heart felt praise,
Sweet Sacrament Divine.
Sweet Sacrament Divine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sweet Sacrament of peace,
dear home of every heart;
Where restless
yearnings cease,
and sorrows all depart.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There in thine
ear all trustfully,
we tell our tale of misery.
Sweet Sacrament of peace.
Sweet Sacrament of peace.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sweet Sacrament of rest,
Ark from the ocean's roar;
Within thy shelter blest,
soon may we
reach the shore.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Save us, for still the
tempest raves;
Save, lest we sink
beneath the waves.
Sweet Sacrament of rest.
Sweet Sacrament of rest.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Sweet Sacrament Divine,
Earth's light and Jubilee;
In thy far depths
doth shine,
thy God - heads majesty.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Sweet light,
so shine on us, we pray,
that earthly joys may
fade away.
Sweet Sacrament Divine.
Sweet Sacrament Divine.
